response.original_title: 機動警察パトレイバー EZY File 2
response.overview: Patlabor EZY File 1 is the first a 3-part theatrical film taking place in 2036, 38 years after the events of Patlabor on Television and The New Files. Set in the TV continuity, this new production does not take place in the same timeline as the Patlabor film series or live-action drama.
response.title: 機動警察パトレイバー EZY File 2
